title: Challenges in Physics based Machine Learning in Laser Powder Bed Fusion
description: In this talk I spoke about the benefits of introducing physics informed features in machine learning tasks that improve additive manufacturing.

title: Trends in Manufacturing
talk_url: "Quarantine Talks" - Mr. Jigar patel LIVE - YouTube
description: In this virtual presentation I spoke about the recent trends in manufacturing and the kind of career opportunities available in the US job market for students studying manufacturing.
